Description:
BE THE FIRST!
First home buyers an opportunity to own your first home on First Avenue is here! But even if you’re not a first home buyer then this brick home has so many features it’s hard to know where to stop! The home consists of 3 bedrooms (2 robed), large L shape lounge/dining room, modern kitchen with a dishwasher and plenty of bench space which overlooks the family room, low maintenance yard and fantastic undercover deck and entertaining area complete with pizza oven and ideal to enjoy your morning cuppa while listening to the birds sing. But if you are a born cook and don’t think the kitchen is quite big enough there is a second preparatory kitchen in the garage giving you plenty of room to host amazing dinner parties. Special features include double garage, plus double carport with second driveway giving access to oversized single garage or shed, 2kW solar panel system, gas ducted heating, cooling, water tanks, fruit trees and so much more. Cockatoo main street is only a few moments away which offers all you need from public transport, shops including post office and schools. Hurry properties in this price range don’t hang around long so be the first to inspect. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 to arrange your inspection now!
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
SUNNY FLAT BLOCK – OPEN PLAN LIVING
A home with character and a flat sunny block in the first home buyer bracket is hard to find, but we have found one for you! This home which is the perfect starter, down-sizer or investment property has 3 bedrooms, 2 located upstairs and main bedroom downstairs, plus central bathroom with bath and spacious large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge with Tasmanian cypress floorboards and high ceilings. Located off the living area is the large undercover entertaining deck perfect for over looking your flat block watching your children play or entertaining all your friends. The home also consists of an open plan timber kitchen with big stainless-steel oven and range hood, dishwasher, gas space heater, wall unit heater and air conditioner. With plenty of off street parking enough room to fit a caravan or two, this home has a lot to offer and in this price range it won’t be around for long. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609, or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
Ideal First Home, Downsizer or Investment!
This charming split level home is perfectly positioned near the end of a no through road and only a short walk to Cockatoo primary school, shops and transport. Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, the Master with ensuite, open plan living room with wood heater, dining area and study nook and the lovely Smith & Smith kitchen with stainless appliances including dishwasher and gas cooktop. Features of the home include timber floors, modern bathrooms, gas ducted heating and vaulted ceilings. For outdoor entertaining the fabulous rear verandah is the perfect place for friends and family to gather or perhaps just relaxing and enjoying the peaceful garden surrounds and Puffing Billy beyond. The rear yard is fully fenced with a gate so you can easily access walking tracks and there is a garden shed for storage and a chicken coup. All the hard work has been done here so you can move straight in and enjoy, perfect for busy people looking for their first home or downsizers enjoying retirement living or for the astute investor!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Grant Day 0417 565 745 or Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
A Wonderful Family Lifestyle On 1/2 An Acre (Approx)
Perfectly set on a park like setting of over half an acre is this stunning home that needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. The home itself has been set up around family lifestyle and offers multiple living areas, 3 spacious bedrooms plus a study that could be easily utilized as a 4th bedroom, master that includes walk in robe, full ensuite and parents retreat, kitchen with quality appliances and Bosch dishwasher with adjoining meals area.
Outside you will find established gardens, covered outdoor area, perfect for year round entertaining, a fenced yard, circular drive, double garage and carport and additional 18,000L water storage.
Special features include fresh color scheme throughout, timber floors, Coonara and split system heating and cooling.
Located only minutes from the townships of Cockatoo and Emerald while also offering the convenience of a bus stop at the bottom of the road, there are plenty of reasons why this home should be at the top of your shopping list! Call today inspection is a must!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Exceptional Opportunity, 2.5 Acres on 4 Titles!
PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR LOCATION AND ACCESS FOR INSPECTION OR PLEASE PARK ON PATERNOSTER ROAD AND WALK INTO PROPERTY OR THE PROPERTY CAN BE ACCESSED FROM SEAVIEW ROAD
Seize the exceptional chance to build the house of your dreams (STCA) on this private 2.5 acre block with 2 road access with the breathtaking backdrop of a majestic forest; you are limited only by your imagination! Immerse yourself in the stunning natural beauty and harmonious serenity of the picturesque Dandenong Ranges. You also have captivating views of Westernport and the Gembrook Ranges. Enjoy freedom, fresh air and space away from the hustle and bustle of the city without sacrificing easy and convenient access to local shops, produce and eateries. So come and watch the sun rise and set capturing the nirvana you've always wanted and snare the rare prospect of a quality of life that's priceless.
LONG SETTLEMENT AVAILABLE.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
FIRST TIME OFFERED IN OVER 50 YEARS - 67 ACRES
Handed down from one generation to the next, this extraordinary property has been a place of refuge, relaxation and recreation for five generations of this family. Cleared paddocks allow for equestrian pursuits or stock whilst the bush section is home to an abundance of native wildlife and caters to those who like to explore nature’s wonderland. The enormous spring fed lake has played host to a variety of water sports and many happy hours have been whiled away in a setting that could be a world away from everything. Pack a picnic and wander over to one of the cleared paddocks and take in the stunning views on offer. The home is surrounded by established European gardens that provide vibrant colour from every angle and has been the setting for many happy occasions including family weddings. There is plenty of shedding including two garages, storage areas, double carport, float cover and stables. The opportunities are limited only by your imagination and could include cropping, farm stay or children’s camp STCA. With bus stop at the door and a highly regarded Primary School and shopping centre a short stroll away you can immerse yourself in this wonderful community and secure an unrivalled lifestyle for your family for generations to come.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 70 Belgrave Gembrook Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Self-sufficiency on half an acre PLUS ART STUDIO/WORK SPACE AND MEN’S SHED
A private oasis set on the high side and at the end of a no-through road. Move in and enjoy the fruits of someone else’s labour. The extra bonus here is a work studio with large walk-in storage, currently used for bottling, AND a garage-cum-men’s shed complete with wood burning stove.
This warm and inviting home just feels good. The construction is mid-80’s brick veneer with newly resealed tiled roof. The central kitchen is the true heart of this household and allows for easy food prep with plenty of bench space, storage & 900mm gas cook top. Keep abreast of everyone’s news in the well zoned meals/living space. And then kick back in the large lounge room with corner picture window that draws the eye out to the garden beyond.
All three bedrooms are a good size. With the master comes a walk-in-robe and en-suite.
Outdoors we have heaps of goodies – to the rear a large covered outdoor entertaining area with sink and bench space for entertaining. Beyond there is a well-designed veggie garden & berry orchard. Take a wander and find lemon, lime, fig & olive trees as well as a more structured front garden with camellias & hellebores galore.
All this can be enjoyed while sipping a morning coffee from the front veranda. There’s even a lovely landscaped area perfect for a fire-pit and evening pow-pows.
All services are connected, sealed driveway, double carport, front gates & fully fenced.
Be sure to inspect as in this climate properties of this quality are moving fast.
Insights: 80 First Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2017 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
ONE FOR THE FAMILY!
This immaculately presented brick veneer home is situated on a flat and very family friendly quarter of an acre. With a bright modern interior, spacious Victorian Ash kitchen with gas cooker and dishwasher, a mixture of blue gum floorboards, Indian coral slate and with the luxury of ducted heating, cooling and ducted vacuuming. Featuring four large bedrooms, master with ensuite, complete with double shower, large open plan living area and a separate lounge with cozy Coonara. Step outside to a fully fenced read yard, ideal for the growing family, a separate bungalow/office, covered outdoor entertainment deck and a double car port. This is a real gem!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
The Ultimate Lifestyle Package on almost 2.5 acres!
Set sale by 20/06/2017
From the moment you arrive, you are sure to fall in love with this stunning property that has been meticulously maintained from top to bottom & has something to offer for the whole family. This beautiful, storybook designed home is spread over two levels & caters for a modern lifestyle boasting 3 bedrooms plus a study or 4th bedroom, a quality modern kitchen offering timber benchtops & stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & an adjoining meals area. The home also features an open plan lounge and dining room complete with wood heater, fresh modern colour schemes throughout, quality carpets, high ceilings, split system heating & cooling, two stunning bathrooms and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through and picture perfect garden views. Outside you will discover a manicured allotment of almost 2.5 acres, featuring established gardens, huge decked entertaining area ideal for entertaining friends and family and a fenced paddock perfect for a pony or pets. To complete this ultimate package, there is a double garage with concrete floor, power and workshop, remote garage and remote gates, veggie garden, 3 large water tanks, 1.5KW solar system and a huge separate garage which has been set up as a studio/home office with two rooms, a modern bathroom, and wood heater.
Homes this good are very few and far between so call today to avoid disappointment!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead

Description:
Character Hills Home on Half an Acre!
This delightful home perfectly located near the end of a no through road and with access to Wrights Forrest walking tracks, offers all the character people are looking for in a home in the Hills. Spacious and warm this welcoming home offers 4 bedrooms, the Master with a study or retreat and a cosy spa room for unwinding after a long day. The spacious living areas consist of a dining room which is open plan with the kitchen with dishwasher, ample storage and gas cooktop. Then you have the living/family room made warm and toasty with a wood heater and the home is heated throughout with gas ducted heating for convenience. Other features include soaring cathedral ceilings, slate floors, ceiling fans and a split system for the ultimate in comfort. For outdoor entertaining you have options with front and rear undercover decks as well as a purpose built rotunda style entertaining room in the rear yard, great for entertaining or simple relaxing whilst keeping an eye on the little ones. The front yard is landscaped and has an impressive circular drive, single carport as well as a double carport and under house storage. The back yard has a vegie patch, a garden shed, cubby house and tranquil gardens with tree ferns and a water feature. This lovely home has a lot to offer and is well worth an inspection to be truly appreciated.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Delightful Character Home!
This lovely home is filled with character and situated on a cleared quarter acre block with peaceful filtered views. The attractive facade makes it a pleasure to come home. The home offers 3 bedrooms, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite, spacious kitchen with loads of bench space, dishwasher and 900mm freestanding gas cook top and large windows to capture natural light and sunshine. There are 2 living areas, the lounge at the front with bay window then the open plan family and meals area. This opens out to the undercover balcony with elevated vistas of the trees beyond. Features include painted timber paneling, beautiful warm floating floor, a double sided toasty wood heater and high ceilings. To add to the features the home is double glazed throughout making it comfortable all year round regardless of the weather. Outside the property is fully fenced with cleared lawn in the front and double carport then to the rear you have lane way access to the 2 car lock up garage, perfect for storing all sorts of vehicles such as trailers, caravans etc. Add to this a water tank for the garden, a veggie patch, another shed for storage and a nice cleared big back yard for the kids and your furry friends and you have a fantastic family home. An inspection will reveal all this property has to offer.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Grant Day 0417 565 745 or Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
Spacious Home With 2 Street Access!
Looking for a home that has it all including shedding with easy access? You've found it. This fantastic brick home has a 6 x 9m lockup shed with heating, concrete floor & power, double carport and a second shed all easily accessed from the rear. The home is very comfortable and spacious with large formal living room with ambient open fire, meals area then a galley kitchen which flows through to the family room. You also have 3 bedrooms plus study area, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite. Features include mains gas ducted heating, updated bathrooms, ceiling fans and the home has mains water as well as gas. For entertaining outdoors there is a delightful paved undercover entertaining area with garden outlook and being on over 1/4 of an acre the landscaped gardens offer plenty of space for the kids and animals to play.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Hidden Gem, Walk to Cockatoo!
This property is a must see! The home is set back off the road on a deep 1 acre block so you are assured privacy and you are so close to Cockatoo Township that you can see it from your front gate. The home itself is being offered for sale for the first time and consists of 3 bedrooms with built in robes, large family room as well as a rumpus room, spacious central kitchen with loads of storage and gas cooktop, laundry and family bathroom. Features include pitched timber ceilings, gas ducted heating, lots of windows for natural light, easy care tiled floor and an air conditioner for the ultimate in comfort. Outside you have under house storage and the established gardens need just a little TLC but have beautiful feature trees for Autumn colour. Properties of this land size so close to amenities are hard to come by and this one won't last long.

Description:
Spacious, Comfortable Home on 1/2 Acre!
This spacious family home has something for everyone. Situated on just over 1/2 an Acre with access to the rear yard, it's perfect for tradies and the ladies will be happy with the generous proportions of the living spaces inside and the kids and furry friends will love the outdoor space with plenty of room to run around. The home offers 3 bedrooms, the Master with built in robe and ensuite, spacious living room, dining and family room and kitchen with dishwasher, electric oven and ample storage. Features include gas ducted heating, making the home warm and cosy no matter how cold outside, air-conditioning, for comfort in the warmer months and for year round entertaining you'll love the large undercover area and rotunda perfect for large gatherings. Pets are organised with a fenced area suitable as a dog run and the man of house will love the Man Cave / shed complete with power, plumbing, bar and potbelly stove for warmth. Add to this a workshop, a single lock up car space and a further lock up shed for storage. Out the front there is off-street parking and landscaped gardens and the rear garden is tiered with a rose walk, cute veggie patch with wrought iron features, chicken coup, loads of lawn area and cubby house for the kids. Homes on this size land and with all services connected and the convenience of rear access to shedding are in demand, so avoid disappointment and book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
FEATURES GALORE - IMMACULATELY MAINTAINED
It is our absolute pleasure to present this immaculate home where you can entertain your friends and family through the seasons with the amazing undercover large deck area, just one of many features to this beautifully presented home. The home features two warm and welcoming living areas, 4 robed bedrooms plus study including master bedroom with ensuite, timber kitchen with plenty of bench space over-looking lounge and meals area, ducted heating and wood fire heater to keep you toasty warm through those cold winter nights and a split system for cooling. Outside is a flat and usable back yard with large chook pen and tiered levels for the kids and animals to play. There is also a double garage, double carport and a sealed drive that continues all the way up to the back yard to give rear access. This home has all you need and is located so close to Cockatoo main street and all it has to offer with its soon to be finished new supermarket. Be quick this is an amazing opportunity that won’t last long. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 to arrange your inspection now!
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
First Home Buyers Delight on Half an Acre!
It's becoming increasingly rare to find properties that are affordable to those wanting to break into the housing market, so this is a great find! Well positioned within walking distance to Cockatoo Township and located on the high side of the road, the property offers private elevated vistas. The home consists of 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes, good sized lounge room with pitched ceiling, gas heating and split system cooling for year round comfort, kitchen and meals area. The updated kitchen has a dishwasher, gas cooktop and views of the rear yard so you can keep an eye on the little ones playing. Outside you have an undercover entertaining area and steps leading to the cleared lawn space with views of the distant hills. Add to this a tiered garden with orchard, garden shed, circular drive and you have the completed picture of a great buy. Avoid disappointment and book your private inspection before it's snapped up by an astute investor.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
“The difference between ordinary & extraordinary is that little extra”
B e s p o k e D e s i g n | U n c o m p r o m i s i n g A t t e n t i o n t o D e t a i l
4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom 2 Zoned Living Spaces Double Garage & Large Shed with Mezzanine 1 Bedroom Apartment/Retreat with own ensuite on 2023m2
A seriously stunning and finely executed high-end turnkey hills home with clean lines and the warmth of recycled timber architectural features, including cabinetry made from Phillip Island Wharf Deck.
This is what you get when a bespoke joiner & cabinet-maker puts his heart & soul into building his own home.

Find out what the owner-builder has to say about his experience…
"I grew up in suburbia and never liked the idea of having neighbours right next to me. I always wanted to live on land. I looked in Upper Beaconsfield and Officer but the land was too expensive and not that good.
I’d never been to Cockatoo but I started to look up here and I saw this site and loved it and just bought it straight away."

Description:
Stunning Contemporary Home Amongst the Tree Tops!
$590,000 - $640,000
Wow! What a stunning transformation; this split level Hills home is set amongst the tree tops giving you a private and tranquil outlook. On offer are 4 bedrooms, 3 on the lower level all with built in robes and with access to the family bathroom, the Master is on the top level with walk in robe, gorgeous ensuite with trendy barn door and its own fabulous balcony, perfect for doing your early morning yoga. The middle level and heart of the home has the entertainer's kitchen with shiny new stainless appliances, fresh white tiles and ample storage. The spacious open plan living and dining room is light and bright and has access to the middle balcony with undercover entertaining with new deck with glass and stainless steel balustrading for low maintenance. Features of the home are all brand new and include mains gas ducted heating, polished floors, quality carpet, fresh white paint throughout and loads of natural light streaming through the many windows and skylights. Outside the landscaped gardens are low maintenance with tree ferns and rock edging and of course beautiful towering gum trees as well as a spacious chicken coop for happy girls. Homes of this quality and style are rare and at this price this one will be popular to many, so avoid disappointment and book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Home Is Where The Heart Is
Here is a fantastic opportunity for you to get into the property market and secure a much loved home. Offering an abundance of living spaces including lounge with crackling wood fire, dining room and a family room with solid fuel fire and split system heating and cooling there is room for all occasions. The modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances and dishwasher and has a meals area adjoining. Situated on a big block of over 1100m2 there is plenty of space for children and pets to romp around. The covered outdoor area is a great place for relaxed entertainment and is sure to play host to many happy gatherings. Within easy reach of all amenities, this is the perfect place to call home.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
